comments: Also number of magic labelings of the cubical graph of magic sum n-1 [Ahmed]. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 25 2007If Y_i (i=1,2,3) are 2-blocks of a (n+3)-set X then a(n-4) is the number of 8-subsets of X intersecting each Y_i (i=1,2,3). - _Milan Janjic_, Oct 28 2007
